sentences.en: Advertisements seem to go from one extreme to the other (= change from one extreme thing to something totally opposite).
sentences.cn: 广告似乎从一个极端走到了另一个极端。

sentences.en: an extreme case of cruelty
sentences.cn: 极严重的虐待案例

sentences.en: Because of the extreme cold, the Antarctic is a uniquely fragile environment.
sentences.cn: 极度严寒造成了南极地区绝无仅有的脆弱环境。

sentences.en: Due to the extreme cold, we were unable to plant the trees.
sentences.cn: 由于天气很冷, 所以我们无法去植树.

sentences.en: Extreme caution should be exercised when buying part-worn tyres.
sentences.cn: 购买部分磨损轮胎时要格外当心。

sentences.en: extreme cold
sentences.cn: 严寒

sentences.en: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.cn: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.en: extreme weather/conditions etc
sentences.cn: 极端的天气/条件等

sentences.en: Force is only justified in extreme circumstances.
sentences.cn: 只有在极端情况下才可以使用武力。

sentences.en: He had extreme difficulty getting hold of the ingredients.
sentences.cn: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

sentences.en: He was given extreme unction.
sentences.cn: 他接受了终傅圣事。

sentences.en: In fact, the truth lies between the two extremes.
sentences.cn: 事实上，真理存在于两个极端之间。

sentences.en: It is hard to imagine Lineker capable of anything so extreme.
sentences.cn: 很难想象莱恩克尔能做出如此极端的事情。

sentences.en: Ministers have shown extreme reluctance to explain their position to the media.
sentences.cn: 部长们极不情愿向媒体解释他们的立场。

sentences.en: on the extreme edge of the cliff
sentences.cn: 在悬崖的最边上

sentences.en: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.cn: 那所佛教寺院位于市郊的最西北角.

sentences.en: Only a tiny minority hold such extreme views.
sentences.cn: 只有极少数人持这样极端的观点。

sentences.en: Our rows become unhealthy in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 我们的争吵变得极其有害。

sentences.en: She lived on the extreme edge of the forest.
sentences.cn: 她住在森林的最边缘.

sentences.en: The body's metabolism is slowed down by extreme cold.
sentences.cn: 严寒可以使身体新陈代谢的速度下降。

sentences.en: The extreme right reared its ugly head in the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 极右势力在20世纪80年代有所抬头。

sentences.en: the reasoning was convoluted in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 这一推理让人极为费解。

sentences.en: they took a commendable anti-ageist policy to extremes.
sentences.cn: 他们将反年龄歧视这一值得称赞的政策推向了极致。

sentences.en: They were reduced to extreme poverty.
sentences.cn: 他们陷入极端贫困的状态。

sentences.en: We are working under extreme pressure at the moment.
sentences.cn: 目前我们正在极大的压力下工作。

sentences.en: You should exercise extreme caution when driving in fog.
sentences.cn: 在雾中开车要极为小心.
